```{r cars}
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(scales)

titer <- read.csv('titer_data/20201210_REGN_titer2.csv', header = T)
order <- c('wildtype', 'E406W', 'C432D', 'N439K', 'K444Q', 'E484K', 'F486K', 'No entry protein')

plot <- ggplot(titer, aes(x=factor(Construct,order) , y=Normalized.Titer, color =Construct)) + geom_jitter(position = position_jitter(width = .15)) + theme_classic() + ylab('Normalized Titer') + xlab('Construct') + scale_y_log10(breaks = trans_breaks("log10", function(x) 10^x), labels = trans_format("log10", math_format(10^.x))) + scale_color_brewer(palette='Dark2') + theme(legend.position = "none") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) + theme(axis.title=element_text(size=8), axis.text = element_text(size=6))

plot(plot)

ggsave('2020120_REGN_pseudovirus_titer_plot.png', width=3, height=3, units = c("in"))
```
